comments:

wpt: 0.7

file contains include tags which refer to files in the same directory with
relative path, then i get the following message all the time :

Mass transfer from pa to dw. Needs more triage. 
I have the same problem. My entire web output files exist under a single project foler...
/web/ configured as my web content folder
under web is the WEB-INF folder with the correct files etc in it.
I have jsp, js, images and themes folders under my web root. In the web-inf folder are the struts and spring tld's.

This configuration works fine for eclipse 3.1.2 with WST. The JSP validation fails due to java 5 generics in my scriptlet code - but once tomcat is running, the JSPs get compiled just fine. I am using the WST->Server deployment tools for my tomcat 5.5 installation.

I get the exact stack trace when editing my JSPs... Almost every keystroke triggers the error.
